name: Q2 HUMANITY
description:
The smash hit game “Q REMASTERED”, which became extremely popular amongst users in
Japan in early 2023, is now coming back! "Q2 HUMANITY" is finally available as Early Access!
Solve the stages by drawing anything you want. Having the full flexibility, you decide your own
solution.
This newly developed “Q2,” the sequel to “Q1,” is a game where you can fly, jump, run, and
even draw, grab, throw things...as a character in the game.

At times you will encounter difficult stages...but what if you had superpowers to overcome
them?

Solve the stages to your advantage, by using characters with superpower!

In “Q2,” each character has a unique superpower, and by choosing the right one, you can
successfully solve and “YOU DID IT” the stages.

Setting fire, controlling magnetism, exploding bombs...manipulate these various types of power
to challenge yourself to furthermore puzzles.

What’s more, “Q2” can be played multiplayer!

Not only does the game have a local multiplayer mode, but by using the “Remote Play
Together” feature on Steam, you can play with up to four people! What happens when all four
players choose characters with different superpower...or what happens when they choose the
same exact superpower?

Will you cooperate together to solve the stages? Or will you all sabotage each other?
Let’s see the chaos and fun that you and your fellow friends will bring to these multiplayer
modes.

The implementation of the “Remote Play Together” means a lot to us.

Because this game series is all about physics and drawing lines freely, adding the multiplayer
feature was always a challenge, since the sync across the networks was something very difficult
to achieve. However the “Remote Play Together” feature has made this possible.

Furthermore, as long as one player owns the game, all players who are invited to the session
can play too even if they don’t have the game!

We had a strong desire for everyone to play “Q2 HUMANITY” to the fullest, so we decided to
implement the remote multiplayer feature for this sequel.
We would love to hear your feedback and thoughts about the multiplayer feature during the
early access period, hence, we have made a discord server for users to share their opinions.

The “Q” Team is committed to making the multiplayer experience as enjoyable as possible for
everyone. We will prepare full support for users by putting useful information and guides on our
website.

The team will continue to provide information on the "Remote Play Together" mode as well, so
all users can enjoy the game to the fullest. Please look forward to it!
　
*This game can be played with local multiplayer, when a gamepad is connected to the device.
